```{r tidytuesday}
#| output: false
#| warning: false
#| echo: false

library(tidyverse)

data <- read.csv("data.csv")

data_transf <- data %>% 
  mutate(Month = case_when(
    Month == "september" ~ "September",
    Month == "july" ~ "July",
    Month == "January" ~ "January",
    Month == "February" ~ "February",
    Month == "March" ~ "March",
    Month == "April" ~ "April",
    Month == "May" ~ "May",
    Month == "June" ~ "June",
    Month == "July" ~ "July",
    Month == "August" ~ "August",
    Month == "September" ~ "September",
    Month == "October" ~ "October",
    Month == "November" ~ "November",
    Month == "December" ~ "December")) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  group_by(Month) %>% 
  summarize(Weight = mean(Weight,na.rm = TRUE),
            N_Plastic = mean((sum(PlasticBottles) + sum(PlasticBags)),na.rm=TRUE)/10000,
            N_Cig = mean(CigaretteButts)/10000) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c(N_Plastic,N_Cig),names_to = "Waste_Type",values_to = "N_Waste")
```
